summary.para: Sets whether the output of the specified transform is cached.

param.name: isCached
param.para: TRUE if the output should be cached; otherwise, FALSE.

summary.para: Sets the properties of the output buffer of the specified transform node.

param.name: bufferPrecision
param.para: The number of bits and the type of the output buffer.

param.name: channelDepth
param.para: The number of channels in the output buffer (1 or 4).

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

item.description: One or more arguments are not valid

remarks.para: You can use the method to see if buffer precision is supported.
The available channel depth and precision depend on the capabilities of the underlying Microsoft Direct3D device.

summary.para: Represents the set of transforms implemented by the effect-rendering system, which provides fixed-functionality.
